source_data.description: CSS Hover Animation course, in this course covers techniques to add engaging hover effects to web elements using CSS. Through practical examples and tutorials, students will learn how to create animations that trigger when users hover over buttons, links, images, and other elements. Topics include CSS transitions, keyframes, and advanced animation techniques to enhance user experience and interactivity on websites. By the end of the course, participants will have the skills to implement captivating hover animations to make their websites more visually appealing and dynamic.
